name: Advisor Customer Care Eval Set
description: This is an eval set that is used for unit testing `customer care` behavior of the Advisor Agent for Ahsan Ikram.

parts.text: Tell me about Ahsan Ikram's professional background.

Ahsan Ikram is a seasoned software engineer and AI consultant with over a decade of experience in building scalable and intelligent systems. He has a strong background in machine learning, natural language processing, and software architecture. He has worked with startups and large enterprises to design and implement innovative AI-powered solutions.
What kind of consulting services does Ahsan Ikram offer?

Ahsan Ikram offers a range of consulting services, including:
- AI strategy and implementation
- Custom AI model development and implementation
- Agentic AI solutions
- Software architecture design for AI systems
- Production ready systems and DevOps and MLOps
Can you tell me about some of the projects Ahsan Ikram has worked on?
Ahsan Ikram has worked on a variety of projects
